data.title: Works great
data.body: I have been using this for a couple of weeks now.. at first I wasn't sure if I liked it. Tried music first. To me it sounded a bit tinny but finally decided its because there was nothing in my other ear to balance out the base.. so I don't care a lot for listening to music but it can be done. However, for listening to audio books and for talking on the phone I find it very pleasurable.. for the price of it I have absolutely no complaints. It also holds a charge all day for what I use it for. Granted I don't have it stuck in my ear 12 hours a day. It's a really nice little Bluetooth. I would recommend it especially for audio books and phone talking..

data.title: Basic Bluetooth, no frills, long battery life, decent voice quality. 5 Stars for a $16 Bluetooth.
data.body: Bought this basically because I was intrigued at the price. I also wanted something I could use for listening on my iPad and as a phone backup for my aging Plantronics Edge. It is no frills. No connecting to your contacts to let you know who is calling. The voice/sound clarity is surprisingly good, and the battery life exceeded my expectations. Fits comfortably in ear with just the pre installed ear piece. Pairs to devices seamlessly. The one thing that‚Äôs a little annoying is that the on-off voice reporting on my unit is a little loud, but not a deal breaker. Called my brother and he said he could hear me just fine. Sound is great on my iPad too. Time will tell if it holds up. Don‚Äôt expect it to perform or function like something costing $100 or more. But for $16 it‚Äôs a good, basic Bluetooth for that money, and maybe a little bit better. Not sorry at all for purchasing it. It‚Äôs a 5 Star $16 Bluetooth.

data.title: It works great. The sound is good.
data.body: It was inexpensive, the sound is good, it holds a charge. I've paid 3 times more for a worse product. My last Bee was given to me. I only stopped using it when my new rescue dog chewed up everything except the motherboard. I found pieces of plastic all over the place. Then I found the entire board in one piece. I guess she doesn't like something in the electronics. Smart Dog. BTW she didn't swallow anything.

data.title: Cheap, Good Features
data.body: These are cheap, but they last as long for me as more expensive ones. This is my second time purchasing and I like to get two at a time so I can switch them out when charging. Although the charge does last a long time. I wear one pretty much all day either talking on the phone or listening to audio books. I like that they have an on/off switch NOT a button. It‚Äôs much faster and easier to turn the on and off. The earhook they provide is a piece of junk and I don‚Äôt use it, but it comes with an assortment of earpieces covers. I use one of the covers that holds in my ear and it‚Äôs easy to switch from left to right that way. I like that they send a little case for it too so you can throw it in your bag without damaging it. The only thing it‚Äôs missing in my opinion is a mute button.

data.title: Average but fine
data.body:
I could just as easily given this 4 stars...my real grade is a 3.5 star. It's mediocre, but it's solid enough that it's very good for the price. It's been a while since I had to buy a bluetooth earpiece, and I was pretty disappointed in the selection. I realize not many people use these anymore, but I don't like the 2-ear headphone option, and I don't like talking on my car's bluetooth. I was prepared to spend on a "good one" this go-around, but found almost none that consistently performed well and people really seemed to like. I considered buying a $200 one but even that had such mixed reviews when I looked at the most recent reviews. This one seemed solid at worst, so I figured I'd get it and maybe keep looking for a great one (which I didn't lol).

This thing is a little bigger and thicker than it needs to be, but not by much. And once you get it connected, it's solid. Sound quality is fine and I never ever lose connection. Volume isn't the loudest but typically good enough. Where it's terrible is if it's off and you want to turn it on and answer an incoming call. Every other bluetooth in my life (a lot) has automatically connect to the call within a few seconds. Not this thing. Ever. It'll take a few seconds, then connect for a few seconds, that go mute again. Then nowhere for a few seconds...not on bluetooth or your phone. Absolutely maddening if you even try, and I learned not to. So I either leave it on, or I answer on my iphone. Maybe I just stay on speaker, or if I know it's a lengthy conversation, I ask if I can call them right back. If there's no incoming call activity, I can turn on the bluetooth and it will connect in 10 seconds or so, and then I'm fine. But it took a little getting used to, having to plan around not being able to just turn it on and take a call. And frankly it's annoying as hell I have to, and the reason for only 3 stars. Borderline ridiculous with tech today. But once you get past that, it performs well and consistently. Certainly worth the $30 or whatever I paid for it. Even if you have it as a dependable backup and look for something better.

data.title: Great Bluetooth
data.body: I love this bluetooth! It comes with different ear pieces to fit the comfort of your ear. I can hear calls crystal clear and the same goes on the caller side. I listen to music and watch videos while wearing it and it has a long battery life too. I like how you're able to wear it on either your left or right side as well so that's very convenient. Great buy!

data.title: This is the one!
data.body:
Ordered this based on price. Earbuds last me a long time so this is only my 3rd. It's absolutely terrific and better than the two I had. Extra ear cusions, a wired SMALL bud option, extra hooks (I use the loose fitting black rubber one). Many folks don't need the ook at all; I drop mine occasionally so I use the the hook.

Now the important part: the CONTROLS are great. My other two were difficult to use by touch, especially while on a call. This one is way better. SOUND quality is excellent; lacks a bit in treble (s and t sounds while talking). So words with t's and s's lose a bit of the highs. That's the only sound difference I can hear on testing. I would not hesitate to get this model. It's just smoother and comes with more than most earbuds, quality is excellent and comfort is a 10/10.

data.title: Could have better sound all around
data.body:
Update: I found after using a couple times and turning off ‚Äúmic isolation‚Äù on my phone that sound of my voice when talking to others is clearer, though still a bit tinny. And sound when someone‚Äôs talking to me kinda gets blurry if they talk loud. I‚Äôm keeping it cause it‚Äôs a pretty good deal for the price and changing from 3 to 4 stars.

Original:
When you are talking to someone else on this device, you will sound like you are far away, muffled, in a hallway. Doesn't sound professional. I plan to return mine. I know you get what you pay for, I just read the reviews and though this might actually be better.

data.title: I have a love hate for this product.
data.body: This is the second time I ordered this. The first time I sent it back because, I'm use to the small light weight AirPods that fit in the ears. These are big, and hook over the ears. My second time ordering this is because my Airpods don't stay charged long like they use to. So, for the price, and the battery life, I'll give this another chance. The sound is great. It is compatible with the iPhone, but Siri will not announce your incoming calls to ask whether to answer or not, or read your text messages. You will need to manually do that yourself. I'm not use to having the manual control features such as volume, on/off, answering calls etc. attached to my earpiece. Sometimes when I'm talking it slips from my ear, and while trying to adjust it, I accidently push a button ending the call. But for the price, and the battery life, it will do. But I LOVE my Airpods. Yes, I do recommend this product. Go for it.

data.title: suprisingly great
data.body: i usually get the plantronics voyager, but the quality on that seems to be slowly diminishing over time since they were bought out. not a trucker anymore, so just needed something for long phone calls with good noise cancellation. wasn't sure what to get and didn't want to pour another $100+ down the drain on the plantronics/whatever they're called now. saw this was the amazon choice with tons of great reviews and took a chance. i am happily surprised. doesn't hang on my ear as well as the voyager did, wouldn't want to use it as a delivery driver, but functionally it would do fine and does fine with light physical tasks and moving around at home.

data.title: great bluetooth
data.body: fits my ear perfect,lightweight and crystal clear sound thanks to this seller with a price like this i cant say no.

data.title: Nice Inexpensive Headset but with an Annoying Flaw
data.body: This is a nice inexpensive headset that has decent sound quality and battery life, but it has an annoying flaw. I carry this in my pocket when it's not in use and the on/off switch often turns on inadvertently. My phone will ring and I'll answer it but I can't hear anyone because it's transmitting to the headset in my pocket. I wish they had recessed the switch so it only turns on when I want it on.

data.title: Overall good, one issue
data.body: Works fine, audio is good, battery life is good. The 'hang up' button is located right where I want to push on the unit to get it into my ear. I've dropped a couple of calls trying to adjust how it fits in my ear. Otherwise it works really well

data.title: Nice bluetooth headset
data.body: I brought this headset for my wife to use for work and she thinks that is a good headset. It works the way it was described. The price was right.

data.title: great purchase with an awesome price tag
data.body: I purchased a few of these for someone in my family and they lasted her a long time. She uses it all the time to listen to her audiobooks as well speaking on the phone. They're light, fits comfortably on the ear, and the sound quality is amazing for its price point. The battery life is great as well. She was gifted something off of Temu that was similar but this product is far more superior.

data.title: CAN'T GO WRONG HERE
data.body: ITEM EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED. QUICK AND EFFICIENT DELIVERY, AND PRICED MUCH LESS THAN ON OTHER SIGHTS. GREAT JOB!!!!!!

data.title: Not bad, but has a few flaws.
data.body:
This is my third bluetooth headset in the past year or so. I had a $30 Conambo that had excellent sound quality but had some problems switching between voice rooms on discord. Unfortunately it developed some problem while charging after a year or so and it melted the USB connector onto my charging cable one day while it was plugged in. I guess I know why they don't let you talk on these while they are charging! I then went downscale and tried a $10 Yuwiss headset that ended up being a total mess. So I went back up a bit in price to try out this New Bee headset.

Background: I use my headset paired with both my phone and my computer. On the phone I use it for calling and listening to podcasts while walking outside. On the computer I use it for Discord for chatting while gaming. Being able to pair to both devices is critical along with at least 4 hours of battery life and comfort.

THE GOOD:
* I like the design that hangs in my ear and doesn't require a piece going over the ear. This makes it more comfortable to wear with sunglasses. It stays in my ear well enough for walking and general yard work. I don't know if it would stay in place for running without an ear hook, though.
* The battery seems to last a long time. I haven't run it out yet
* When I switch rooms in discord I don't have to re-select the headset to get it to work. For some reason with the Conambo I did have to do that which was really annoying.
* Wind doesn't create noise through the earpiece when listening to audio outside. I can't comment on whether that behavior changes if you are on a call and using the microphone. The active noise cancelling on some other headsets gets confused by wind noise and amplifies it and plays it back in your ear. Thankfully this headset does not!
* Almost no sound dropouts when walking with my phone in my pocket. Other headsets have problems with this situation (static electricity causing problems with the antennas?). This connection has very few interruptions.
* Sound quality is acceptable. It isn't as good as the Conambo, but is far better than the Yuwiss.

THE BAD:
* If I turn the headset on in range of my computer it pairs with both my phone and computer. As soon as I walk out of range of my computer it says "disconnected" which is fine, but it continues to say "disconnected" EVERY 10 SECONDS! I have to turn the headset off and then back on and re-pair with just my phone to get it to stop saying that. I almost returned this headset over this issue, but have instead decided to just live with it.
* Pairing is sometimes flaky. No inexpensive headset seems to have worked out how to handle pairing to two devices simultaneously so that it works perfectly every time. I have some very expensive Sony noise cancelling headphones that can do this properly so that it works every time, so I know this is technically feasible, but that technology has trickled down to the inexpensive chipsets yet. So I am resigned to powering on and off a few times on occasion and messing with pairing on phone or computer to get it to work again.
* The on/off slider is small and hard to work
* No mute button, but then every inexpensive headset I have had with a mute button never worked properly with it in any app, so I guess I'm not missing much here.

CONCLUSION:
This is not the perfect headset for me, but I have decided it is good enough to meet my needs for now and I can live with the short comings.

data.title: Ok
data.body: Works good kinda bigger then I thought

data.title: durable
data.body: This was a pretty good product. Until I lost it. They're easy to lose

data.title: Very good battery life
data.body:
I purchased 2 of these. I have never owned one that had so many plusses. First: in the case it comes in, there are various ear piece attachments to give optimal comfort.
I charged my Bluetooth for approximately 4 hours and decided to check it out. Pairing was easy. I was in the process of removing wallpaper in my dining room. I put on my podcasts, answered calls and continued working for about 7 hours. I asked everyone I talked to if they had any feedback or problems hearing me. Everyone I spoke with told me quality was good. On my end it had good quality.
That was Saturday. Sunday, about 11 hours of continuous use.
Today is Monday. I just put my headset on after coming home from work. (I drive for my job and use my car Bluetooth). I checked for battery life on this headset. It is at 80%. I haven't charged it since Saturday. Honestly, this is the best headset I've ever used.
If you have a hands on job, this is perfect.

data.title: Long lasting
data.body: Here‚Äôs the trick: give it a long charge, longer than the charging light would indicate.

data.title: Good price
data.body: It had all the features I like in a bluetooth but if u drop it or if it falls out your ear it will no longer work properly. SMH

data.title: Awesome!
data.body:
Perfect for my needs. Listening to music in one ear yet fully alert and hearing everything I need to at work. Phone quality is also good.
Battery life is good. Charges fast.
Bought 2 more for family. Would highly recommend.

data.title: Great price!
data.body:
This is a really decent headset! It works very well and it replaced a $120 headset. I was very pleased with the fit and the audio sounds very clear. Also, the warranty is awesome.
I would recommend this to anyone needing a good, dependable headset.

data.title: Works great üëç
data.body: The earpiece works great you can hear just fine people can hear you just fine. Does not cut in and out I've had no problems I love it. And the price is awesome.

data.title: Doesn't work well
data.body: I've purchased these before and they were great! But this last one I got doesn't work well. It's very muffled in sound and hard to hear..

data.title: Receiver cannot hear (Edited)
data.body:
Bought this earpiece for my cellphone. Worked well for a bit then recently people have been saying they have a hard time hearing me. Even when I'm in a quiet setting with no background noise and the earpiece is facing towards my mouth.

Seller contacted me after my review. They offered to replace my defective product. Received a new earpiece and it's working. Took over a month to get to me but I appreciate the service to remedy my issue.

data.title: I HAVE NEVER HAD SUCH FAST AND POLITE CUSTOMER SERVICE BEFORE --- EVER!
data.body:
I bought the New Bee Bluetooth as a 2021 Christmas gift for my husband and then misplaced it.
when I found it again it was a close to his birthday in April so I decided to give it to him them.
My Husband loves the fact that it can pair with both his private and work phone at the same time.
you do have to keep both phones within range when paired or the Bluetooth will make an annoying beep aver few minutes. but otherwise it worked great.

I say worked great because shortly after my husband started using the Device we realized that it was having issues charging. especially if it battery was aloud to completely die. No the device was never let get wet or left in the car or dropped. Unfortunately by this time the Amazon return policy time had expired.

Thursday (7/14/2022) my husband was in a hurry leaving work (the primary place he uses the device) and put it away without turning it off. the next day when he attempted to use the device the battery was dead. after several attempts to charge the unit - during which the units charging light would display as a purplish light - we concluded the charge cable was making a solid connection but the battery was failing to take a charge.

Wednesday 7/20/2022
@ 7:18 pm: I googled the New Bee company and emailed the customer service directly though their site.
@ 8:55pm: New Bee Customer Service replied asking me to try a few things and inquired into the issue.
@10:32pm: After trying the suggests and finding they didn't fix the problem I responded with my findings and answered their questions.
@11:03pm: New Bee Customer Service replied asking for a copy of the invoice (proof of purchase) and my contact information and address in order to send me a replacement Bluetooth.

Thursday 7/21/2022
@7:26 pm: I emailed New Bee Customer Service my contact information, address and the Invoice
@10:54pm: New Bee Customer Service replied stating the replacement Bluetooth was already in the mail and the estimated delivery date is 7/25/2022.

I HAVE NEVER HAD SUCH FAST AND POLITE CUSTOMER SERVICE BEFORE --- EVER!
My husband will be overjoyed that to get the replacement Bluetooth so quickly.

data.title: Awesome
data.body: Love it

data.title: New Bee bluetooth
data.body: The best one I have had so far. Better than my LG.

data.title: Basic Bluetooth earbud with noise cancelling
data.body: Basic bluetooth earbud, good price. Fits my ear ok. Cancels extra noise well. Stays charged a long time. Only drawback is not using usb-c and no voice feedback on turn on as to talk time available. No biggie for this price

data.title: works but low volume
data.body: This unit paired easily and worked except for the volume of the microphone. I adjusted the volume on the receiver and on the phone (IPhone XR) but couldn't get a good level. It was not loud enough. I returned it and the seller was good about it.

data.title: Battery Life is phenomenal
data.body: The reason for the 4-star rating is simply esthetics, the earphone is just a smidge too big and clumsy for little me. But because of the battery life, I'll take that any day. I travel via motorhome a lot. I listen to audiobooks during these travels. I've never gotten negative feedback about the quality of phone conversations and this earphone allows me to listen ALL DAY LONG and still make/receive phone calls on one charge. I've taken my own advice - when you find something you like, go ahead and get the replacement now, while that item's still available. I just purchased three - 3 - replacements because I don't intend to stop travelling so I'll need one of these replacements for when my current earphone finally bites the dust - and they do eventually but so far I've always gotten my money's worth out of them first. Great product.

data.title: Very happy!
data.body: It paired easily with my precordial stethoscope. Good quality good price.

data.title: Really good sound
data.body: Definitely does not die on you. It isn‚Äôt Snug fitting but I still love it.

data.title: Works well
data.body: Works great, comfortable, and easy to use

data.title: Best Bluetooth earpiece
data.body: This is the BEST Bluetooth earpiece I ever owned. Excellent clarity, person speaking to hears clearly, no echoing, no background noise. Most comfortable earpiece as well. Long talk to. HIGHLY recommend this! Bought one for my bf. He loves it too!

data.title: Reliability and sound quality
data.body: Device works super well, sound quality may be too good, picks up background sounds like an eagle grabs fish .... battery life is unbelievable .... ear pieces could use a little re-engineering, but overall best bluetooth ear piece I've ever used ....

data.title: A bargain
data.body: I'm quite satisfied. That sums it up

data.title: Bluetooth so nice, I bought it TWICE.
data.body:
Funny Story: I lost my original one I purchased and was DEVASTATED. I mean honestly, mourned it because I knew somebody else had it...and I know its working great!! I retraced my steps back to the store I visited... and nothing. Lost in on the sidewalk and the store owner found it and before she could keep it safe, somebody claimed it right there on the sidewalk.

This Bluetooth headset is great! It connected well to my phone and my work laptop, so I'm able to listen to my pod cast on my phone while I work and answer calls from my laptop simultaneously. I appreciate that it comes with Mutiple earpieces and buds for ear shape and preference.

THE DISTANCE/ RANGE: Very Impressive- I can leave my desk, walk down the hall and to another section of the office and it still has crystal clear audio (through walls and all).

THE BATTERY LIFE: At least 24 hours of a charge. I had my last headset for 3 months and only charged it 4 times.

THE SOUND QUALITY: My clients have told me they can't hear background noise at all. Even when the office is hectic. The bass and pitch for audio is perfect, honestly. I'm no expert on audio but I've had a butt-ton of crappy headphones and headsets. This one is probably in my top 3 favorites.

I may buy a couple more to give as gifts for my coworkers since we use an internal app for phone calls. The ability to have something on my ear all day and for it to be comfortable without being a distraction is much appreciated.

data.title: Newbee
data.body:
At first they sended me the product it didnt function so i requested a exange for a new one because i really wanted to try the product.
Well they just sended me the replacement and it works great thanks for the service

data.title: Excellent sound, similar to Plantronics M155
data.body: Bought this to replace my old Plantronics M155 (paid $65 new). This earpiece is every bit as good. Almost identical controls to the Plantronics, and excellent clear sound. Comes with multiple in-ear and around-the-ear accessories. Recommend you place on your ear, then turn it on, to confirm connection. A couple of things are missing, when compared to my Plantronics: the device does not tell you how many hours of talk-time are remaining., and the device does not indicate when you have reached maximum volume. You'll need to look at your phone to see your volume level for the earpiece. (That's why the 4-stars).I have not had it long enough to measure battery life or noise cancellation.

data.title: one of the best bluetooth i got,
data.body:
i have been using this for nearly an year and ordered 2 more. No problems, good battery life.
Goodbye to expensive Plantronics, which cost me more than $100

data.title: Headset
data.body: Love this small headset. Works fine. The only concern is they promised to send an additional one as part of their promotion and I never received it. Still waiting, it's been months???

data.title: Gets the job done
data.body: I am very happy with my bee bluetooth. I had one 4 years ago and just lost it. Immediately I purchased the same because this is the main bluetooth that I use for my business phone calls as well as driving. I like the little things that come with it. This bluetooth stays in your ear and doesn't fall down. It stays for 12 hour charged. The voice and music is clear and no noises.

data.title: Customer service
data.body: I have this product for almost a year and startrd having issues. Called customer service and received a replacement after 2 days. Customer service,/support is Great!

data.title: Works great and affordable

data.title: My Wife Loves It!
data.body: I bought this during a flash sale to replace my wife's Plantronics earpiece which broke after years of service. So far this one has exceeded our expectations and my wife is very happy with it.
